TopicTitle: K3 Industries Catalog (B9, KW, KSPX, Spherical Tanks)

Articles.Content:
Here are some of my latest creations, got plenty more but most of them are too old to be relevant/optimal now

Javascript is disabled. View full album

IP CTC-B JAL

Interplanetary Crew Transport Craft B variant, soft landing capable, Jet Assisted Launch.

Delivers 6 Kerbals anywhere in the kerbol system, usually to an orbiting station for further transfer into a lander, re-fuels at said stations to operate fixed routes between LKO Station Alpha and Stations around other planets/moons. Is soft-landing capable in atmosphere but it's not part of it's normal mission parameters. B spec is launched using SABREs in jet mode during most of the ascent to save on fuel, A spec is the same craft launched using conventional external rocket boosters.

Senior port on the back and radial regular port, senior port used to attach to the front of larger assemblies in orbit to act as a command module.

KW, B9

Javascript is disabled. View full album

IP KM-O + LPO SA

Interplanetary Kethane Miner OrbCraft + Low Planetary Orbit Station Alpha.

Self propelling planetary station and kethane miner, station empty while lander has enough fuel to push the assembly anywhere in the kerbol system and then detach to mine kethane and return to fill the station, station has 2 senior ports and 4 normal ports, used as a hub for personnel transports, material transports and re-fueling station for interplanetary missions. Kethane miner has 2 micro-landers for surface conditions scouting, re-attaches to the big lander before ascent. Both launched on top of large KW asparagus launchers, both launched empty or partially empty to fuel up in LKO. Miner has been to Minmus and back to LKO to stock up on fuel on it's own.

Spherical Tanks, Kethane, B9, KSPX

Javascript is disabled. View full album

LKO CTC VSSTO

Low Kerbin Orbit Crew Transport Craft Vertical Single Stage to Orbit.

The pride of the K3 fleet, Delivers 6 kerbals to LKO And can return 6 others in the same mission without refueling, completely re-usable, just pack the parachutes and re-fuel on the ground, capable of performing powered and un-powered soft landings.

B9, KSPX

Javascript is disabled. View full album

D8RO JAL

Duna Octo Re-Orbiter, Jet Assisted Launch.

Carries 8 kerbals to the surface of duna and 8 others back up again to LDO without refueling.

B9, KSPX, Spherical Tanks, KW

Javascript is disabled. View full album

LKO VSSTO SL

Low Kerbin Orbit Vertical Single Stage To Orbit Satellite Launcher "The Silver Bullet"

Partially re-usable, fully re-usable model using docking ports and a crane to attach new payload and fairings on top of previously used launcher planned.

B9, KSPX, Art of Re-entry

Javascript is disabled. View full album

LKO RV 4KM

Low Kerbin Orbit Return Vehicle 4-Kerbal Moose "The Frisbee"

Gets you from LKO to KSC on the cheap, test pilots had no complaints especially after they read the terms of their NDAs.

Art of Re-entry

Thoughts? Comments?
